attributes.action: Close schools and fine households if online work not completed
attributes.background: Fine a certain amount of money if online work isn't completed by students so students are compelled to work as schools are shut.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Deciding how to ensure pupils complete work they are set would be a matter for individual schools.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You might also like to sign the following petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Keep schools closed until Covid 19 is no longer a threat
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316404
